attributes.additional_details: Why is there alcohol for sale or available in the houses of parliment. mp's and lord's could be voting on matter's that efect you while under the influence of alcohol. Would you want an doctor to see you after a drink, or a bus driver to drive you after a drink, they say two drink's effect driving, so it must efffect clear thought proccesing. ban it while the houses are sitting, or make it an offence to vote in parliment after consuming alcohol.
